title: P-Square reacts to Soundcity's refusal to air their videos
content:
So fans were concerned about P-Square's videos not being played on Soundcity music channel.A fan even said the channel refused to play a video request of their song by Yemi Alade..Turns out the superstars have a problem with the management of Soundcity as Peter Okoye took to twitter to tell fans to ignore the channel ..
More below
